Sets the [`Color3`](https://create.roblox.com/docs/reference/engine/classes/Color3) value of the highlight's interior
| FillColor = [255, 100, 50] | FillColor = [0, 255, 125] | FillColor = [75, 150, 255] |
| - | - | - |
